verses.text: \w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, Esther \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* regalia \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w opposite|strong="H5227"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w opposite|strong="H5227"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* Esther \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, she won \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w held|strong="H4428"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w sceptre|strong="H8275"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* Esther \w approached|strong="H7126"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sceptre|strong="H8275"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther? \w Whatever|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w*, \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w granted|strong="H5414"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* if \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*.’

‘If \w it|strong="H5921"\w* seems best \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*,’ Esther said, ‘let \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* come \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.’

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* ordered, ‘\w Bring|strong="H6213"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4116"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* Esther’s \w wish|strong="H1697"\w* \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* gratified.’ \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* Esther \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w While|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* \w drinking|strong="H4960"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Esther, ‘\w Whatever|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w petition|strong="H7596"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w*, \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w granted|strong="H5414"\w*. \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w*, \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* – \w even|strong="H5704"\w* if \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w takes|strong="H5414"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*.’

‘If \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* won \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w favour|strong="H2580"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* if \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w seems|strong="H5869"\w* \w best|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w petition|strong="H7596"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* accede \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w*, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w petition|strong="H7596"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w come|strong="H4279"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. \w Tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w answer|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w question|strong="H1697"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* wishes.’

\w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w joyful|strong="H8056"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* elated, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w noticed|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w stood|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w moved|strong="H2111"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w furiously|strong="H2534"\w* \w angry|strong="H2534"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*.

Nevertheless \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* restrained himself \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w went|strong="H1004"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*. \w He|strong="H1004"\w* called together \w his|strong="H7971"\w* friends \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w Zeresh|strong="H2238"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* wife

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w recounted|strong="H5608"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w greatness|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wealth|strong="H6239"\w*, \w how|strong="H1431"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ways \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* honoured \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w how|strong="H1431"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w promoted|strong="H1431"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* courtiers.

‘\w What|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w*,’ \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, ‘\w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther \w brought|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w which|strong="H4960"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* \w except|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w invited|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w* \w along|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w does|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w satisfy|strong="H7737"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w as|strong="H3427"\w* \w long|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H3427"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.’

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w Zeresh|strong="H2238"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wife \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* friends \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, ‘\w Let|strong="H8056"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w* \w seventy-five|strong="H2572"\w* feet \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* erected, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w speak|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w let|strong="H8056"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w go|strong="H3190"\w* \w merrily|strong="H8056"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w*.’ \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w advice|strong="H1697"\w* \w pleased|strong="H3190"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w* erected.
